name: TX CO2 T&H AMB 600-023
description: The level of CO2 is the main indicator of the air quality breathed by the building occupants. This data has a direct influence on the daily comfort of the occupants in enclosed spaces, and can trigger issues such as fatigue, drowsiness, and headaches.Designed for measuring air quality in tertiary environments, the LoRa(WAN) Enless air quality sensor allows you to monitor CO2 (ppm), temperature, and humidity values in the building.The CO2, temperature, and humidity LoRa Enless sensor is suitable for various types of buildings: residential buildings, offices, schools, public or cultural establishments..etc
author: Akenza AG
